alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 7:23PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cuyahoga and southwestern Lake Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 723 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lakewood to near Parma. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Willowick, Parma, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Willoughby, Eastlake, Warrensville Heights, Highland Hills, Timberlake, Lakeline, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights, South Euclid, Mayfield Heights, East Cleveland, Lyndhurst, University Heights and Wickliffe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
